page.title: 11 Clubs and Societies
page.content: By visiting the local library at Wilnecote and writing to the local schools we were able to find out what activities were for all ages. We discovered that there were 146 different clubs in our block.There are at least 22 sporting clubs including cricket, football,keep fit,cycling, archery and boxing. There 20 clubs for women,mainly Womens Institutes and 13 Working Mens Clubs and Social Clubs. For younger people there are 8 Cub Packs,10 Scout and 11 Guide Packs, 11 Youth Clubs and 2 Boys Brigades. For the elderly there were 9 clubs.As well as 2 Jazz Bands there were 15 other local clubs of which the most unusual was the international Cliff Richard Movement. Nobody could say there was nothing to do around here!
